name: Nokko
description: Spring into action with Nokko! With his strong roots and an array of tricky fungi this young defender will quickly grow on you

abilities.name: Stinkbrain
abilities.description: Throw a mushroom that periodically sheds poisonous spores, inflicting <DT_VIRAL_COLOR> Viral Damage and Status Effect upon nearby enemies while also lulling them to sleep.

abilities.name: Brightbonnet
abilities.description: Release a rejuvenating mushroom that emits a radial pulse, giving Nokko and his allies’ <ENERGY> Energy and applying a buff to Ability Strength that lasts for a short time.

abilities.name: Reroot
abilities.description: Revert to Sprodling form, spawning orbs that heal Nokko and grant a speed boost. While in this state, Nokko is untargetable and heals gradually.

abilities.name: Sporespring
abilities.description: Unleash a chaotic ballistic mushroom that seeks enemies and bounces explosively off whatever it touches. Contact with any of Nokko’s mushrooms invigorates them, doubling their pulse rate.

languages.description: Spring mit Nokko in Aktion! Mit seinen starken Wurzeln und einer Reihe trickreicher Pilze wird dir dieser junge Verteidiger schnell ans Herz wachsen.
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: Passez à l'action avec Nokko! Avec ses racines puissantes et ses nombreux champignons rusés, ce jeune défenseur vous séduira rapidement.
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: Entra in azione con Nokko! Con le sue radici forti e una serie di funghi insidiosi, questo giovane difensore ti conquisterà rapidamente
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: 놋코와 함께 팔짝 뛰어 행동에 나서 보세요! 튼튼한 뿌리와 다양하고 교묘한 균사류를 갖춘 이 어린 수호자는 금세 당신의 마음에 뿌리를 내릴 겁니다.
languages.name: 놋코

languages.description: ¡Entra en acción con Nokko! Con sus fuertes raíces y una variedad de hongos astutos, este joven defensor te conquistará rápidamente.
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: 和 Nokko 一起行动起来！这位年轻的守护者拥有强大的根系和各种古灵精怪的真菌，很快就会扎根在你的心里
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: Отправляйтесь в бой вместе с Нокко! Благодаря своим крепким корням и множеству хитрых грибов этот юный защитник быстро вам понравится.
languages.name: Нокко

languages.description: Nokkoと跳ね上がろう！　強い根とトリッキーな動きでこの楽園の守護者は強力な助っ人になる。
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: Wskocz do akcji z Nokko! Dzięki silnym korzeniom i gamie podstępnych grzybków ten młody obrońca pobudzi cię do działania
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: Entre em ação com o Nokko! Com suas raízes fortes e uma variedade de fungos traiçoeiros, este jovem defensor vai conquistar você rapidamente.
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: 與 Nokko 一起行動！憑藉著一身強壯的根系和一系列巧妙的真菌，這名年輕的守護者將迅速地在你心裡扎根。
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: ออกลุยไปกับ Nokko! ผู้พิทักษ์ตัวน้อยที่มีรากแข็งแรงและมีเห็ดราที่แสนเจ้าเล่ห์เพทุบายมากมายคนนี้จะทำให้คุณรู้สึกเอ็นดูอย่างแน่นอน
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: Nokko ile harekete geç! Güçlü kökleri ve bir dizi zorlu mantar ile bu genç savunmacı, kısa sürede gözünde değer kazanacak
languages.name: Nokko

languages.description: Уривайтеся в битву з Нокко! Завдяки своїм міцним кореням та різноманітним хитрощам цей юний грибозахисник швидко припаде вам до смаку.
languages.name: Нокко
